main event: A UFO sighting occurred in New York City on 14 February 1955 involving an oval-shaped object observed with irritable movements over a few minutes.
interesting points: The sighting involved three observations of the same object, which appeared brighter in subsequent sightings., The object was initially heading south over Central Park before reversing direction., The report suggests that the sightings could have been related to searchlight activity reflected off haze or low clouds., There were no photographs taken of the object during the sightings despite claims of photographic evidence., The object was visible for a duration of 2-3 minutes during each sighting.
location: New York City, New York, USA
